lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Election Commission announced last night that 613 candidates would contest the 148-seat House of Representatives, while 255 candidates would fight for the 76 Senate seats.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Porter, a key member of the opposition economic think tank, said he played a leading role in formulating the tax plan but not Howard's proposed expenditure savings, which Keating claimed were distorted through double counting.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The conservative opposition, already fighting an uphill election battle, now faces controversy in its own ranks over a possible error in its major tax cutting program, economists said.
